name: The Agony in the Garden
description: The Agony in the Garden; Valerio Castello (Italian, 1624 - 1659); about 1645; Pen and blackish brown ink and light brown wash, heightened with white gouache; 13 x 15.9 cm (5 1/8 x 6 1/4 in.); 92.GB.78; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: The Agony in the Garden
medium: Pen and blackish brown ink and light brown wash, heightened with white gouache
